Upload a Device Software Image

  1. In the left navigation pane, click Devices > Upgrade.
  2. In the Device Upgrade and Rollback window, click Add File or Drop File Here button to navigate to the software image file on your local system or drag and drop a file from your system to this button. For example:
The image file appears in the Image Inventory section. You are now ready to upgrade your device with the uploaded software image.
Parent topic: Upgrade Devices through PW EMS
